jobDescription: PARTNER ACCOUNT MANAGER Metalogix is the market leading provider of software solutions to move, manage and protect content within enterprise collaboration platforms in the Cloud and on-premises.  We are seeking a Partner Account Manager (PAM) in our Washington DC. The ideal candidate for this position has proven that they are a motivated individual with strong organization skills that can work in a team environment, has attention to detail, and a desire to grow their career in the software industry by exceeding their goals. This position comes with an excellent compensation package consisting of a competitive base salary and performance-based commission.  The Partner Account Manager will be responsible for day to day collaboration with sales, marketing, solutions engineering and operations in efforts to develop strategic relationships, facilitate partner enablement efforts, and to grow the pipeline towards increased partner driven billings.
